# Pull Request Template

## Acting Role
**Who is submitting this PR?** (e.g., Execution Agent, QA Agent)

## Related Issue(s)
**Link to GitHub issue(s):**
- Issue: #

## Founder Decision(s)
**Which Founder Decision(s) govern this work?**
- FD-YYYY-NNN: [Decision Title]

## Summary
**What does this PR do?** (1-2 paragraphs, clear and specific)

## Changes Made
**List all changes:**
- [ ] Code changes: ...
- [ ] Test changes: ...
- [ ] Documentation changes: ...
- [ ] Configuration changes: ...

## Acceptance Criteria Verification
**Verify all acceptance criteria from the issue are met:**
- [ ] Criterion 1: ...
- [ ] Criterion 2: ...
- [ ] Criterion 3: ...

## Testing
**What tests were added or modified?**
- Test file: ...
- Coverage: ...%
- All tests passing: Yes / No

## Documentation
**What documentation was updated?**
- [ ] README updated
- [ ] API docs updated
- [ ] Architecture docs updated
- [ ] Decision rationale documented
- [ ] Examples provided

## Governance Compliance
**Verify governance compliance:**
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets
- [ ] No undocumented assumptions
- [ ] Offline-first invariant respected (if applicable)
- [ ] Test-first invariant respected (if applicable)
- [ ] All decisions linked
- [ ] No scope creep

## Risks & Mitigations
**What risks does this introduce?**
- Risk: ...
- Mitigation: ...

## Breaking Changes
**Does this introduce breaking changes?**
- Yes / No
- If yes, explain: ...

## Deployment Notes
**Any special deployment considerations?**
- Database migrations: ...
- Environment variables: ...
- Feature flags: ...

## Reviewer Checklist
**For Lead Agent reviewing this PR:**
- [ ] Acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Tests adequate and passing
- [ ] Documentation complete
- [ ] No governance violations
- [ ] No security risks
- [ ] Backwards compatible (if applicable)
- [ ] Ready for merge

## Additional Context
**Any additional context or notes?**

---

## Important Notes

- **All sections are required.** Incomplete PRs will be rejected.
- **Link the related GitHub issue.** Work must be traceable.
- **Link the Founder Decision.** All work must reference governance.
- **Document your decisions.** Explain why you made each choice.
- **Verify acceptance criteria.** Ensure the issue is actually resolved.
- **Governance compliance is mandatory.** No exceptions.

**No PR may be merged without Lead Agent approval.**
